004
005package edu.wpi.first.math.jni;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.util.RuntimeLoader;
008import java.io.IOException;
009import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
010
011/** TrajectoryUtil JNI. */
012public final class TrajectoryUtilJNI {
013  static boolean libraryLoaded = false;
014
015  static {
016    if (Helper.getExtractOnStaticLoad()) {
017      try {
018        RuntimeLoader.loadLibrary("wpimathjni");
019      } catch (Exception ex) {
020        ex.printStackTrace();
021        System.exit(1);
022      }
023      libraryLoaded = true;
024    }
025  }
026
027  /**
028   * Force load the library.
029   *
030   * @throws IOException If the library could not be loaded or found.
031   */
032  public static synchronized void forceLoad() throws IOException {
033    if (libraryLoaded) {
034      return;
035    }
036    RuntimeLoader.loadLibrary("wpimathjni");
037    libraryLoaded = true;
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Loads a Pathweaver JSON.
042   *
043   * @param path The path to the JSON.
044   * @return A double array with the trajectory states from the JSON.
045   * @throws IOException if the JSON could not be read.
046   */
047  public static native double[] fromPathweaverJson(String path) throws IOException;
048
049  /**
050   * Converts a trajectory into a Pathweaver JSON and saves it.
051   *
052   * @param elements The elements of the trajectory.
053   * @param path The location to save the JSON to.
054   * @throws IOException if the JSON could not be written.
055   */
056  public static native void toPathweaverJson(double[] elements, String path) throws IOException;
057
058  /**
059   * Deserializes a trajectory JSON into a double[] of trajectory elements.
060   *
061   * @param json The JSON containing the serialized trajectory.
062   * @return A double array with the trajectory states.
063   */
064  public static native double[] deserializeTrajectory(String json);
065
066  /**
067   * Serializes the trajectory into a JSON string.
068   *
069   * @param elements The elements of the trajectory.
070   * @return A JSON containing the serialized trajectory.
071   */
072  public static native String serializeTrajectory(double[] elements);
073
074  /** Sets whether JNI should be loaded in the static block. */
075  public static class Helper {
076    private static AtomicBoolean extractOnStaticLoad = new AtomicBoolean(true);
077
078    /**
079     * Returns true if the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
080     *
081     * @return True if the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
082     */
083    public static boolean getExtractOnStaticLoad() {
084      return extractOnStaticLoad.get();
085    }
086
087    /**
088     * Sets whether the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
089     *
090     * @param load Whether the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
091     */
092    public static void setExtractOnStaticLoad(boolean load) {
093      extractOnStaticLoad.set(load);
094    }
095
096    /** Utility class. */
097    private Helper() {}
098  }
099
100  /** Utility class. */
101  private TrajectoryUtilJNI() {}
102}
